ISSUE.TITLE: image for D
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I really like the idea of having a web service like drone.io to build projects. I have still to find a service that provides ways to build D (http://dlang.org) projects with dedictated environments. So can drone be the first one please? With some guidance on your ways of providing images, I'm likely able to provide an image myself. I guess a D image should be pulled into the drone/images repo right? Is this Repo also providing images for the drone.io web service?
